text: Rosic (Rosic' ) is a word in some Slavic languages meaning "Rus person". Rosic is also a surname. Notable persons with that surname include: *Branko Rosić, Serbian musician and journalist, see Artistička radna akcija *Đoko Rosić (born 1932), Bulgarian-Serbian actor *Nikola Rosić (born 1984), Serbian volleyball player *Serbian Patriarch Varnava (Petar Rosic) (1880–1937), patriarch of the Serbian Orthodox Church ==See also== * Rosich * Rusich (disambiguation) * Rosice
title: Rosic
